content: this is a summary of a legal case involving two parties the case was heard by the higher court in ljubljana and a judgment was made on december 23 2021 the specific details of the case including the names of the parties are not provided the court appeal resulted in a change to the initial judgment specifically regarding compensation the final resolution of the case involves a judgment on joint investments in real estate with the assets being split equally between the plaintiff and the defendant who are former spouses the court of appeal reviewed the appeal made by the defendant and found their argument to be valid the court also addressed issues related to financial assistance the assessment of evidence and the calculation of property value the costs of the case were determined and the defendant is responsible for paying them the appeal was partially successful resulting in a modification of the lower courts judgment the court of appeal also made a decision regarding the costs of the appeal which will be paid by the defendant

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani I Cp 2002/2021, 23. 12. 2021
